selected_quotes: @LGBTConsortium Pls RT interesting research article in favour of funding for #trans men to have #masectomy on #NHS
@TransBareAll Pls retweet important research article in favour of funding for #trans men to get #masectomy on #NHS
Interesting Annals paper advocates funding for mastectomychest contouring for female-to-male transsexuals #trans
@lgbtfriend Please RT interesting research article in favour of funding for #trans men to have #masectomy on #NHS

citation.abstract: In the UK, funding for a bilateral mastectomy (BLM) and associated chest recontouring for female-to-male transsexuals (trans men) has been rejected by some funding authorities on a number of unsustainable grounds.
citation.journal: Annals of the Royal College of Surgeons of England
citation.title: The case for bilateral mastectomy and male chest contouring for the female-to-male transsexual
